verses.roman:
sei rādhāra bhāva lañā caitanyāvatāra
yuga-dharma nāma-prema kaila paracāra

synonyms: sei—that; rādhāra—of Śrīmatī Rādhārāṇī; bhāva—the emotion; lañā—taking; caitanya—of Lord Caitanya; avatāra—the incarnation; yuga-dharma—the religion of the age; nāma-prema—the holy name and love of Godhead; kaila—did; paracāra—preaching.
translation: Lord Caitanya appeared with the sentiment of Rādhā. He preached the dharma of this age-the chanting of the holy name and pure love of God.
